name: SUPER MARIO TAKES A BIG FAT SMELLY PEE PEE
name_original: SUPER MARIO TAKES A BIG FAT SMELLY PEE PEE
description:
"Time to take a piss." - Super Mario, 2016

Run, jump, and piss your way through the Mushroom Kingdom in the latest action-packed addition to the Mario series! With over 30 seconds of gameplay, this game is guaranteed to provide you with hours of entertainment.

(Note: This game is still very early into it's development, and there is very little to offer in terms of content. The level tileset is ripped from Super Mario Bros X, and is only meant to serve as a placeholder.)
